CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Vintage?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Vintage is arc {Sustainable Fashion}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Vintage?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Vintage is arc {Luxury Fashion}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Luxury Fashion} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Sustainable Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Luxury Fashion to Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Luxury Fashion to Vintage in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Vintage to Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Luxury Fashion and Vintage in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Luxury Fashion and Vintage is {206}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Vintage in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Vintage is {224}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Vintage?
SC.A: The total flow output from Vintage is {430}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Vintage?
SC.A: The total flow input by Vintage is {504}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 423? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {537} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Sustainable Fashion}, a flow of {431} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Vintage}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 139? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {73} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Vintage}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 215 and 423? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {416} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}, a flow of {224} from {Vintage} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Vintage to Sustainable Fashion or from Vintage to Luxury Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Vintage} to {Sustainable Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Luxury Fashion to Vintage, from Sustainable Fashion to Vintage, or from Vintage to Sustainable Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Vintage} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Sustainable Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Luxury Fashion} and {Sustainable Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Luxury Fashion, Arc Sustainable Fashion, Arc Vintage}.
